daedalusTransfer.error.webSocketRestoreE: 還原區塊鏈結時出現錯誤。
daedalusTransfer.errorPage.title.label: 無法還原 Daedalus 錢包。
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.step0: 尋找 Daedalus 助憶鍵並將其準備妥當
輸入Daedalus錢包的主密鑰來恢復餘額並將所有資金從Daedalus轉移到Yoroi。
輸入用於備份Daedalus Paper錢包的27字恢復短語，恢復餘額並將所有資金從Daedalus轉移到Yoroi。
Yoroi and Daedalus wallets use different key derivation schemes, and the address format is different on each. Due to this, at present the funds from a Daedalus wallet cannot be simply imported directly into Yoroi. Instead, you must create a Yoroi wallet and transfer your funds over from Daedalus. (Daedalus and Yoroi wallets are fully compatible for transferring funds.)

If you do not currently have Daedalus installed, or if you cannot access it, you can enter your 12-word recovery phrase from Daedalus (or 27 words for a paper wallet) and transfer your entire wallet balance over from Daedalus into Yoroi.
daedalusTransfer.title: 轉移 Daedalus 中的資金
daedalusTransfer.waiting.title.label: 正在還原 Daedalus 錢包...

The selected language translation is fully provided by the community.

Your paper wallet PDF is ready
settings.paperWallet.dialog.finalize.int: to keep the paper document and secret words safe.
to remember the password, or write it down and keep it safe!
settings.paperWallet.dialog.password.int: Yoroi Paper Wallets are encrypted with a password.
You must have it to restore your funds!
It is your own responsibility to make sure you remember it.
settings.paperWallet.dialog.verify.messa: This is the final step. Please verify the mnemonic phrase (printed on the PDF certificate) and the password to make sure you have all the valid information to *access your funds later*. On the next screen you will also be able to verify the account checksum and copy your new addresses.
settings.paperWallet.printIdentification: Enabling this will help you verify your wallet at the moment of restoration, but it will also **forfeit plausible deniability**.

settings.support.logs.content: 若想檢查記錄，您可以 {downloadLogsLink}。記錄不包含機密資訊，將這些記錄附加至問題報告，幫助團隊調查您遇到的問題非常有用。使用錯誤報告功能時，可以自動附加記錄。
settings.support.logs.title: 記錄

transfer.form.instructions.step1.text: 恢復你的餘額大約需要1分鐘。在下一步, 您將看到一筆將從Daedalus移動您所有資金到Yoroi的交易。請仔細閱讀交易細節。您需要在卡Cardano網絡上支付標準交易費用才能進行交易。
transfer.form.masterkey.input.label: 主密鑰
transfer.form.masterkey.requirement: 注意: 主密鑰為192個字元及十六進位編碼
transfer.instructions.instructions.text:
Before you can transfer funds, you must create a Yoroi wallet and back it up.
Upon completion, you will receive a 15-word recovery phrase which can be used to restore your Yoroi wallet at any time.

wallet.add.dialog.restoreNotificationMes: 目前正在修復錢包中。在完成之前，無法恢復或導入新錢包。
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.ledge: A Ledger hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.trezo: A Trezor hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.normalWa: If you have a Yoroi recovery phrase consisting of 15 words generated when you created a Yoroi Wallet, choose this option to restore your wallet.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.paperWal: If you have generated a Yoroi paper wallet (which is usually printed and kept offline), you can choose this option to import the funds from your Yoroi paper wallet.

wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: 確保無人窺視您的螢幕，除非您希望他們存取您的資金。
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec:
在下列螢幕上，您將看到一組 15個 隨機單詞。這是
    您的錢包恢復短語備份片語。可將其輸入任何版本的 Daedalus 應用程式，
    以備份或恢復您的錢包資金與私密金鑰。
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di:
請確保您已於某個安全之處小心地寫下您的復原片語。
    您下一次使用與復原時將需要用到此片語。片語區分大小寫。
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: 我明白我的密鑰是安全地儲存在此設備上，而不是公司的伺服器上。

我瞭解，若此應用程式被移至另一個裝置，或者被刪除，我的資金
    僅可使用備份片語復原，該備份片語已在某個安全之處寫下。
按正確順序點選每個單詞，驗證您的復原片語
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.about.prer: 您的電腦在整個過程中, 必須保持與互聯網的連接。
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.connect.in: 這個過程將與Yoroi共享Cardano公開公鑰。
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.save.error: 未能保存。請檢查您的互聯網連接, 然後重試。

wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.common.step: 點擊此處了解有關使用Yoroi和Ledger的更多情報
Cardano ADA 應用程式必須安裝在Ledger設備上。
Cardano ADA 應用程式必須在Ledger設備上保持打開狀態。
在整個過程中, Ledger 設備必須保持與電腦的連接。

wallet.redeem.dialog.adaPasscodeHint: 輸入您的 ADA 密碼
wallet.redeem.dialog.certificateHint: 把證書拉在此處，或單擊一下在電腦上查找
wallet.redeem.dialog.emailHint: 輸入您的電子郵件地址
wallet.redeem.dialog.headline: 兌換ADA
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.forceV:
要兌換您的ADA，請上傳您的證書或複制並粘貼證書中的兌換碼。 以下是兌換密鑰的示例。你的密鑰看起來很相似：

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

如果您與證書一起上傳PDF文件，則會自動提取兌換代碼。

如果您上傳加密證書，則需要提供您的電子郵件地址，ADA密碼和ADA金額 解密您的證書，您的兌換碼將被自動提取。
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.paperV: 要兌換您的ADA，請從證書中輸入您的鑰匙，然後選擇應兌換ADA的錢包並輸入{adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} 字助記密碼。
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.recove:
要使用恢復服務中的強制銷售證書兌換您的Ada，請上傳您的加密證書並輸入解密密鑰。您的解密密鑰應如：

qXQWDxI3JrlFRtC4SeQjeGzLbVXWBomYPbNO1Vfm1T4=

上傳加密證書並輸入解密密鑰後，系統會自動提取您的兌換密鑰，您就可以將ADA兌換到所選的錢包。

要使用恢復服務中的定期出售的證書兌換您的ADA，請上傳您的加密證書並輸入{adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} 字符助記符密碼。

上傳加密證書並輸入{adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} 字符助記符密碼後，系統會自動提取您的兌換密鑰，您就可以將ADA兌換到所選的錢包。
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.regula:
要兌換您的ADA，請上傳您的證書或複制並貼上證書中的兌換碼。 以下是兌換密鑰的示例。你的密鑰看起來很相似:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

如果您與證書一起上傳PDF文件，則會自動提取兌換碼。

如果您上傳加密證書，則需要提供 {adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} 字助記符 密碼來解密您的證書，您的兌換碼將被自動提取。
wallet.redeem.dialog.passphraseHint: 在此輸入您的 {length} 字助記詞
wallet.redeem.dialog.redemptionCodeHint: 輸入兌換密鑰或上傳證書
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.checkbox: 我已經理解了以上的信息
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.disclaim: 注意：於Cardano測試網兌換將驗證您的證書或兌換密鑰是否正確，並允許您兌換TEST-ADA作為測試目的。請保證您的證書或兌換鑰匙安全無虞。 您需要在主網上兌換。 TEST-ADA沒有任何價值。
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.title: Daedalus Redemption Disclaimer
wallet.redeem.noWallets.headLine: 不可兌換ADA，因為您沒有任何錢包。
wallet.redeem.noWallets.instructions: 創建一個新錢包（或恢復現有錢包），然後回到這裡並選擇它進行ADA兌換。
wallet.redeem.success.overlay.headline: 您已成功兌換

wallet.restore.dialog.verify.intro.line4: If you've entered wrong mnemonics or a wrong paper wallet password - you will just open another empty wallet with wrong account checksum and wrong addresses.
